text: Sui Ran (), born June 25, 1992) is a Chinese professional basketball player. He currently plays for the Shandong Golden Stars of the Chinese Basketball Association. He represents China's national basketball team at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.2016 Olympic Games: Tournament for Men - Ran SUI (CHN)'s profile, FIBA.com, accessed 17 July 2016. ==References== ==External links== *Asia-basket.com Profile *NBADraft.net Profile *REAL GM Profile Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Basketball players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Basketball players from Shanxi Category:Chinese men's basketball players Category:Chinese Basketball Association players Category:Olympic basketball players of China Category:Sportspeople from Taiyuan Category:Point guards Category:Shandong Heroes players Category:Shooting guards
title: Sui Ran
